Every â€œI choose,â€ â€œI help,â€ â€œI want fairâ€ is a civic act.
Access to communication is access to democracy.

viralPosts.text:
Today I had to vote on a school bond to *bring local schools into compliance with the ADA." Read that again. 

I was 15 when the ADA passed and my old schools are STILL NOT ACCESSIBLE. I am 50 now, almost 51.

#CripTheVote
